author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wuhan Thalys Medical Technology says 2017 A share dividend payment
text:
April 19(Reuters) - Wuhan Thalys Medical Technology Inc
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.1 yuan per share(before tax) and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 1.5 new shares for every one share for 2017, to shareholders of A share recorded on April 24
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 25 and the dividend will be paid on April 25
